schema.description: 用于保证请求的幂等性，防止重复提交请求。由客户端生成该参数值，要保证在不同请求间唯一，最大值不超过64个ASCII字符，且该参数值中不能包含非ASCII字符。

400.errorMessage: A package instance is not allowed to operate independently.
Pricing plan price result not found.
You have not passed the real-name authentication and do not meet the purchase conditions. Please log in to the user center for real-name authentication.
Your account quota limit is less than 0, please recharge before trying to purchase.

403.errorMessage: The Engine in the Region is not available.
The resource is out of usage.
There is no authority to create instance in the specified region.
The quota of create instance exceeds.
The operation is forbidden by Aliyun Realname Authentication System.

404.errorMessage: The  provided RegionId does not exist in our records.

title: 查询可见地域列表
summary: 该接口用于获取地域列表。
description:

- RDS MySQL
- RDS PostgreSQL
- RDS SQL Server
